name: Pok√©dex on IOS
description: Using thousands of images from the web as training data, the pokedex still needs more data. Where's Ash when you need him?

name: Little worlds
description: Using Create.js and Hammer.js, this is a solar system simulator, each planet has randomized topography, and land features

name: Class Tracker
description: A class tracking app complete with calendar, events and color coded categories, using Java AWT for graphics, and a SQLITE Database

name: Evolution Algorithm
description: Using a brute force method of evolution, this simulation "learns" to complete an obstacle course with no assumptions made about it.

name: Library Spare System
description:
This app tracks which students have spares, and are spending them in the school library.
 Made for Northern Secondary School, this was created with Java AWT and SQLite

name: Fred's Adventure
description: A demo for my rpg, which follows Fred, a rabbit with the power to transform into a monster

name: Irving's Adventure
description: A runner game where you attack using keyboard controls, with a crazy giant rooster on a floating scooter as the final boss

name: Little People
description: A (slightly buggy) simulation, showing autonomous people gathering resources and building small villages
